text: Soni pati gasoomedwe kukwao ma Aya Getu gakupikanika chenene, awala wangaakwembecheya ya kusimangana Nowe akasatiji: “Ikani najo Qur’an jangawaga aji, kapena n’jigalausye.” Jilani: “Nganiyiwa kukwangu yanti mpaka najigalausye mwakusaka kwangu, ngangukuya ikaweje yayikuuwulidwa kukwangu, chisimu une ngogopa ilagasyo ya lisiku lyekulungwa naga nanyosye Ambuje wangu.”
